definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Reduced instances of players dribbling ball out of play.
sentences.chinese: 减少了球员盘带时的失误。

sentences.english: Dribbling better, differences in acceleration of players play a greater role.
sentences.chinese: 盘带得到改善，球员之间的加速能力差异是关键因素。

sentences.english: The dribbling also feels noticeably different this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年盘带也有显著的改变。

sentences.english: The dribbles are done with the triggers.

definition: to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
